commentBody:
* Constant scandals
* Unseemly brutality
* Blowhard owners (led by the oafs in Dallas, L.A., and Washington)
* A commissioner who makes more than an entire small town, pop. 1,000

I used to love rooting for the NFL. However, it's become just another Poster Child of American Excess.

I won't give one more penny to this Dysfunction. I hope others join the march.
